name: Assembly bot (Bwaaah)
description:
Description:

Your mission is controlling a "simple" bot and guard it to the target position.

"Simple" means really simple, the bot can't move without connecting with any control units.

However, the control units can only be connected while they are close to the bot or other connected control units.
Be careful, You may  "LOSE CONTROL" in this game physically.

Controls:

  • Run control  units: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Restart: R 

Your bot

Connected Control Unit - Run control unit to move your bot

Disconnected Control Unit - Move your bot close to connect it

Goal - Reach here to win
